EmailTemplate.name: CHN-2017-02-21-RTP Hockey Game.EMAIL-Registration Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}'s Confirmation to the Turbonomic & RTP Event| February 21, 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name:default=}}, Thank you for registering to attend the Turbonomic & RTP Event! We will be distributing additional details in the weeks to come. Event: Devils & Senators Hockey Game Sponsored by Turbonomic & RTP Attending: {{lead.Full Name:default=edit me}} Company: {{company.Company Name:default=}} Event Time: February 21st at 6:00pm Event Location: Prudential Center, Newark, NJ
If you have any questions or concerns please reach out to Carolyn.Green@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:marketing@turbonomic.com]]> -The Turbonomic Team
